definition: Water Cube, nickname of Beijing National Aquatics Center 北京國家游泳中心|北京国家游泳中心, swimming venue of Beijing 2008 Olympic Games
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Linglong Tower stands in the Olympic center area between the National Stadium and the National Aquatics Center.
sentences.chinese: 玲瓏塔坐落於奧體中心區，在鳥巢和水立方之間。

sentences.english: She liked the place because it gave her a clean feeling.
sentences.chinese: 曹說喜歡水立方因爲它給了她一種乾淨的感覺。

sentences.english: The Beijing Olympic Village is near to the main Olympic venues such as the National Stadium and the National Aquatics Center.
sentences.chinese: 北京奧運村與奧運主場館如國家體育場和水立方相鄰。

sentences.english: A symphony concert will debut in the Water Cube during the National Day holiday.
sentences.chinese: 例句十一時期，水立方將舉行交響音樂會的首演。

sentences.english: Then we went to the water cube. From outside, the whole building looked so sturdy.
sentences.chinese: 接着我們到了水立方，從外面看整個建築很敦實。

sentences.english: But, how to get the design concept of cubic meters of water?
sentences.chinese: 但是水立方的設計概念是從何而來的呢？
鳥巢和水立方的景象非常壯觀。

sentences.english: China expects to make a clean sweep in the Water Cube at home land.
sentences.chinese: 中國跳水隊希望在水立方包攬所有金牌。
